name: skill-circle-microservices
description: Microservices architecture for Skill Circle learning platform

scripts.health: docker-compose exec api-gateway curl -f http://localhost:3000/api/status || exit 1
scripts.setup: npm run setup:env && npm run setup:databases
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate:user && npm run migrate:learning
scripts.migrate:user: docker-compose exec user-service npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.migrate:learning: docker-compose exec learning-service npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.seed: npm run seed:skills && npm run seed:content
scripts.seed:skills: docker-compose exec skills-service npm run seed
scripts.seed:content: docker-compose exec content-service npm run seed
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.lint:services: docker-compose exec api-gateway npm run lint || docker-compose exec user-service npm run lint || docker-compose exec skills-service npm run lint
scripts.monitor: open http://localhost:8500 && open http://localhost:8081 && open http://localhost:8082

author: Skill Circle Team
